name: SpaceShooter (Thenk0)
description:
This is my first game
Use WASD or Arrows to move and Space to shoot. In menus use mouse to click buttons.

This game has:

  1. 5 unique weapons and 5 upgrades for each
  2. 5 unique enemies
  3. Fully functional highscore system
  4. Lives 
  5. Some animations and sounds

Warning! This game might work unstable or not work at all, if you don't have any audio devices plugged in.
